column4: is it possible to change the fileformat of a disk from ext3 to fat32 without loosing the data on the disc?
is it possible to change the fileformat of a disk from ext3 to fat32 without loosing the data on the disc?
No, but why would you want to? :)
Well, there is, actually. Backup, mkfs.vfat, restore. But I don't think that was what you were after.
